title: Software Developer 3
description:
**Job Description**
 Details on the opening:
   

  

 Database Test and Tools Development team is looking for bright and talented engineers from top tier institutes to apply their ingenuity to test Oracle's flagship product. It is an opportunity to demonstrate your skills as a Test Development Engineer for Oracle's cloud enabled platforms by developing cloud enabled tests for various features in Database, Cloud services and Engineered systems.
   

  

 We need to develop tools/ framework and test applications/scripts and automate the test setup needed for the features of Oracle Kernel code we are testing and often would need to simulate functionality in a regular Linux machine to run functional tests.
   

  

 Please note that this is a programming position as all the tests/frameworks are applications which should exercise a feature in the yet to be released version of Oracle product.
   

  

 These test programs runs fully automated on a server farm \\- so our test framework need to configure, run test applications/inject failures, and verify results by itself. Even though some generic utilities are available, most of the features would need very specific test programs/frameworks.
   

  

 The opening is for an individual contributor position in Database test and tools development team. In this position, you will be working very closely with the feature development team to create a test plan/tools/infrastructure needed for the feature. You will also be reviewing the feature specifications (Functional \\& Design spec) before it is finalized as your inputs from a customer perspective might be important in the implementation.
   

  

 Our primary development platform is Linux, and depending on the area you work on the coding would involve Perl, Python or C to develop test programs.
   

  

 The challenge and the advantage is in understanding the technology and apply it in a practical setup.
   

  

 What you gain:
   

  

* Exposure to cutting edge technologies/products in database/cloud space
* Work with core team of people from top colleges to build best in class Database products.
* Deep dive into Database/Cluster/Cloud services domains.
* Exposure to Open source technologies Docker, Jira, Kafka, ML.


 The group:
   

  

 'Database test \\& tools development' group (part of the database server group of Server Technologies Division) works on the upcoming releases of Oracle database server, enveloping a wide range of technologies.
   

  

 My team works on test development for DB Tools like Oracle Application Express, SQL Developer, SQL Developer as extension for VS Code, Oracle REST Data services, SQLcl both for on\\-prem and Autonomous Database.
   

  

 The group with its state of the art development infrastructure and practices, helps shape technology that has been important for a large number of Fortune 2000 and other companies. The group foresees product usage scenarios, simulates real life problems, tests the forthcoming releases of Oracle database server and ensures that the customers get the highest quality database.
   

  

 Requirement:
   

  

* B.Tech/M.Tech C.S. from a premier institution.
* Candidates with good relational database fundamentals.
* Web applications and desktop applications QA : Experience in Oracle DB, SQL.
* Exposure to latest Oracle database features is desirable
* Must have excellent hands on experience in test design, development and execution.
* Experience in web automation using Selenium tools or other open source tools in PC or Mobile platform is required.
* Product development QA, Product integration QA / automation web applications QA background.
* Experience in using and configuration of RESTful Services and configuration of Oracle DB.
* Excellent quality work, results oriented, Independent/Personal Drive, Good troubleshooting skills required.
* Excellent communication (written and verbal), interpersonal and good team player.
* Ability and enthusiasm to learn new technologies, adeptness in seeking solutions to complex problems.


**Responsibilities**
 As part of the Server Technologies, you will work together with the team members in the US headquarter and India Development Center (IDC) to design, develop and maintain a top grade software test system for the famous Oracle JDBC/UCP drivers, which are being used by hundreds of thousands of users worldwide. You will have the opportunity to explore the latest technologies in Java, JDBC and the latest version of the Oracle databases, including our various cloud offerings. Provide technical leadership to other software developers. Specify, design and implement modest changes to existing software architecture to meet changing needs.
   

  

**Qualifications**

*Mastercard powers economies and empowers people in 200\\+ countries and territories worldwide. Together with our customers, we’re helping build a sustainable economy where everyone can prosper. We support a wide range of digital payments choices, making transactions secure, simple, smart and accessible. Our technology and innovation, partnerships and networks combine to deliver a unique set of products and services that help people, businesses and governments realize their greatest potential.*
**Title And Summary**
 Software engineer (PowerBI, SSIS, SSAS, SQLServer, Oracle DB)
   

  

**All About Us**
 MasterCard is a technology company in the global payments business. We connect consumers, financial institutions, merchants, governments, and businesses worldwide and enable them to use secure and convenient electronic forms of payment.
   

  

 Join the industry’s most passionate, motivated \\& engaged global team \\- Our employees are encouraged to drive innovation every day in support of a more connected world – A World Beyond Cash.
   

  

**Overview**
 The MasterCard B\\&MI Technology development team is engaged in working with new and innovative technologies to build business solutions that keep MasterCard positioned as a leader in delivering value added business analytic and reporting solutions to our diverse customer base. We work collaboratively with our product partners and other technical teams to continuously improve and enhance our existing products and drive new products to the global marketplace. We are currently seeking candidates that will be responsible to design and produce a high\\-quality code using different languages, have data engineering expertise with good understanding of application development.
   

  

**Role**
* This position is a member of the MasterCard B\\&MI Technology focusing on development of Enterprise Application Development using Java tech stack and Angular/React as the Front\\-end technologies.
* Participate in the gathering of business requirements.
* Ensure software designs align with MasterCard’s Enterprise Architecture and leverage our enterprise services.
* Ensure product development meets MasterCard’s business needs.
* Ensure development teams use the appropriate MasterCard standard development methodologies and follow our technology standards, and that all projects and development are appropriately documented.
* Ensure that software and system design and delivery support the goal of zero down time in production.
* Work closely with business partners on product definition, product roadmaps, business case development, and overall direction for the team.
* Respond to operational and business concerns or issues relative to future business programs, projects, or enhancements to ensure consistent delivery of quality services.
* Ensure development supports all appropriate certifications and compliance requirements, including those for PCI, GLBA, Safe Harbor, and others.
* Responsible for performance engineering of the enterprise software architecture, and providing functional guidance, advice, and/or training to other application developers.
* Work with large datasets, ensuring data quality, accuracy, and performance.
* Implement data transformation, integration, and validation processes to support analytics/BI and reporting needs.
* Responsible for designing, developing, testing, delivering, and monitoring scalable and secure cloud architectures, using various AWS cloud and cloud native platforms, such as EC2, ECS, S3\\.
* Need to improve and expand the existing platform by ensuring that it is resilient, secure, and scalable.


**All About You**
* Bachelor's degree in Information Systems, Information Technology, Computer Science or Engineering or equivalent work experience
* Excellent Communication skills required to interact across multiple organizational levels of internal and external customer groups.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving abilities, with quick adaptation to new technologies, methodologies, and systems
* High\\-energy, detailed\\-oriented, proactive, and able to function under pressure in an independent environment along with a high degree of initiative and self\\-motivation to drive results.
* Strong interpersonal, relationship\\-building with a solid track record for developing internal and external.
* Strong data analysis skills across multiple source systems of various formats
* Expertise in data engineering, ETL/ELT processes, data warehousing, and data modelling
* 3\\-4 years of experience in Data Warehouse related projects
* Expertise in Data Engineering and Data Analysis
* Experience of working with Databases like MS SQL Server, Oracle and have strong SQL knowledge
* Experience in BI tools like Tableau, PowerBI, SSIS
* Familiarity with cloud platforms and services, such as AWS, Azure.
* Familiarity and knowledge on technical skills like J2EE, Java 8 or higher, JSP, Servlets, Spring 5, Hibernate, and Database (Oracle, SQL Server)
* Experience with SQL and NO SQL databases like MySQL, Postgres, MongoDb etc.
* Familiarity in the following a plus: Web Services \\- SOAP/ RESTFul, Servers \\- WebSphere/JBOSS/Tomcat, HTML/ javascript/ JQuery, UNIX ( Shell, awk scripting), XML/ XSLT, CSS, C Sharp, React / Angular, IDE (Microsoft Visual Studio, RAD/ Eclipse)
* Experience with various tools (Maven, Gradle, Jenkins, Chef, Sonar) and methodologies ( Waterfall, Agile)


**Corporate Security Responsibility**
 All activities involving access to Mastercard assets, information, and networks comes with an inherent risk to the organization and, therefore, it is expected that every person working for, or on behalf of, Mastercard is responsible for information security and must:
   

  

* Abide by Mastercard’s security policies and practices;
* Ensure the confidentiality and integrity of the information being accessed;
* Report any suspected information security violation or breach, and
* Complete all periodic mandatory security trainings in accordance with Mastercard’s guidelines.
